title: Munch Madness: Firehouse Subs vs Jersey Mike's with Carl Tart & Lamar Woods
itunes:title: Munch Madness: Firehouse Subs vs Jersey Mike's with Carl Tart & Lamar Woods
description:
Carl Tart & Lamar Woods (XOXO, Gossip Kings) join the 'boys to discuss hot vs cold subs before tackling the semi-soft finals of Munch Madness 2022: The Tournament of Chompions: Hero's Journey: Sub-Optimal. Plus, a brand new segment, The Michelin Men.

Sources for this week's intro:
https://www.mashed.com/149053/the-untold-truth-of-jersey-mikes/
https://moneyinc.com/firehouse-subs/
https://www.jerseymikes.com/history
https://www.firehousesubs.com/find-out-our-story/

Want more Doughboys? Check out our Patreon!: https://patreon.com/doughboys

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
